tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    message_text TEXT,
    customer_id UUID,
    sent_at TIMESTAMP,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaPosts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    sentiment_analysis VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerInteractions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MessageTailoring (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_content TEXT,
    message_date TIMESTAMP,
    targeted_group VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  account_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT REFERENCES social_media_accounts(account_id),
  post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
  post_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
  commenter_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  comment_content TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE reactions (
  reaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
  reactor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  reaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    comment_content TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP,
    post_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_content TEXT,
    message_date TIMESTAMP,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (receiver_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);
